General specifications.Background suppression: max. + 10 % of the upper limit of the detection range
General specifications.Diameter of the light spot: approx. 70 mm at a distance of 2000 mm

Indicators/operating means.Control elements: Sensing range adjuster , Light-on/dark-on changeover switch

Output.Switching power: DC: max. 50 W AC: max. 500 VA
Output.Timer function: ON delay (GAN), OFF delay (GAB), one shot (IAB), ON delay-one shot (GAN-IAB), ON delay-OFF delay (GAN-GAB), programmable adjustment interval 0.1 ... 10 s

Approvals and certificates.Protection class: II, rated insulation voltage ≤ 250 V AC with pollution degree 1-2 according to IEC 60664-1 Output circuit insulated from control circuit in accordance with IEC 61140.
Approvals and certificates.Caution: The protection class 2 is only valid when the terminal compartment is closed.
Approvals and certificates.UL approval: E87056 , cULus Listed Caution: This equipment is considered as open-type equipment. It must be mounted within an enclosure, that is suitably designed for protection against internal fire and personal injury resulting from accessibility to live parts according UL 508.

Note: Refer to 'General Notes Relating to Pepperl+Fuchs Product Information'.
